abstract: Baseball Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates defeat Detroit Tigers, 7-4; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Polanco had two of Pittsburgh’s six doubles, and Verlander allowed seven runs and 10 hits in four and a third innings.

headline.main: Pirates Beat Tigers as Justin Verlander Is Shelled
headline.print_headline: Pirates Beat the Tigers as Verlander Is Shelled

snippet: Gregory Polanco had two of Pittsburgh’s six doubles, and Verlander allowed seven runs and 10 hits in four and a third innings.
